mapper.select: SELECT vw_empl_rige.nom_empl AS firstname, vw_empl_rige.ape_empl AS lastname, vw_empl_rige.box_mail AS email, vw_empl_rige.cod_empl AS personalId, tb_carg_clap.direccion AS direccion, TRIM(vw_empl_rige.nom_empr) AS empresa, tb_carg_clap.subdireccion AS subdireccion, tb_carg_clap.coordinacion AS coordinacion, tb_carg_clap.gestion AS gestion, tb_carg_clap.cargo AS cargo FROM Empleados_Rigel AS vw_empl_rige INNER JOIN MY_CLAP AS tb_carg_clap ON vw_empl_rige.nom_carg = tb_carg_clap.cargo AND vw_empl_rige.nom_ccos = tb_carg_clap.nom_ccosto WHERE vw_empl_rige.ind_acti = 'A' AND vw_empl_rige.cod_empl = #{personalId} AND year(vw_empl_rige.fec_naci) = #{yearNac};
